title: Sound On: Ukraine Refugee Crisis, Trump's Kingmaker Status
itunes:title: Sound On: Ukraine Refugee Crisis, Trump's Kingmaker Status
description:
Guests: Bloomberg reporter Aggi Cantrill, Bloomberg National Political reporter, Mark Niquette, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and John Sitalides, Geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisers.
